articles.author: Kurt Schussler, Winnie Hsu, Michael Msika
articles.title: Global Tech Stocks Drop as ASML Warning Adds to Nvidia Curbs - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Technology stocks sank as new US government restrictions on the export of Nvidia Corp. chips to China and a disappointing report from ASML Holding NV fanned trade war concerns, wiping out $155 billion in market value for the two companies alone.
articles.content: Technology stocks sank as new US government restrictions on the export of Nvidia Corp. chips to China and a disappointing report from ASML Holding NV fanned trade war concerns, wiping out $155 billio… [+468 chars]

articles.author: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai
articles.title: For security, Android phones will now auto-reboot after three days - TechCrunch
articles.description: The update comes months after Apple pushed its own “inactivity reboot” feature.
articles.content:
Googles mobile operating system Android will now automatically reboot if the phone is locked for three days in a row.
